thread.title: Woman crashes into cars, building while attempting to hit a man she's accused of stalking
thread.title_full: Woman crashes into cars, building while attempting to hit a man she's accused of stalking

author: Prescotte Stokes III | pstokes@al.com
title: Woman crashes into cars, building while attempting to hit a man she's accused of stalking
text: The Foley Police Department reported that Susan Kotkiewicz, 56, who has a history of stalking a male employee at Freeman Collision in Foley, observed the male employee in the bay of the building and proceeded to accelerate, attempting to run the man over.
